name: Garlic Seasoned Vegetables
author: Swanson®
summary: Simmering vegetables in chicken broth and fresh minced garlic will bring out the best flavor in whatever combination you may choose.
ingredients: 1 ¾ cups Swanson® Chicken Broth or Swanson® Certified Organic Chicken Broth or Swanson® Natural Goodness® Chicken Broth
4 cups fresh cut up vegetables (broccoli, celery, peppers, carrots)
directions: Heat the broth, garlic and vegetables in a 3-quart saucepan over medium-high heat to a boil
Cover and cook for 5 minutes or until the vegetables are tender-crisp
Drain the vegetables well in a colander
